name: Vilkas

aspects.high_concept: Sharpest Mind and Bitterest Blade in Jorrvaskr
aspects.trouble: The Wolf's Anger Is My Own
other_aspects: Harder on Himself Than Anyone Else

stunts: Tactical Eye: +2 to Notice when assessing enemy formations or combat terrain.
Scholar-Warrior: Once per session, Vilkas may use Lore in place of Fight for a single overcome action when recalling a historical combat technique.
Pack Ferocity: When fighting alongside another Companion NPC, both gain +1 to their next Fight roll.

personality_notes.speaking_style: Sharp-tongued, precise, measured. Sounds more like a scholar than a warrior but hits harder than most.
motivations: Uphold the Companions' legacy and Ysgramor's ideals
Support Kodlak's quest for a cure
Keep the guild disciplined and worthy
fears: Losing control to the wolf's rage
The Companions falling from honor after Kodlak is gone
Being consumed by the beast blood before a cure is found
quirks: Quotes Ysgramor's history at seemingly random moments
Tests new blood hard — takes it personally if they fail
Sharpens his blade when brooding, which is often

relationships.Kodlak Whitemane: Deep reverence; Kodlak is father-figure and moral compass
relationships.Farkas: Twin brother; protective, occasionally exasperated by Farkas's simplicity
relationships.Skjor: Mutual respect, ideological friction over beast blood
relationships.Aela the Huntress: Tense camaraderie; she embraces what he resents
relationships.Elitrof Whitemane: Earned respect through discipline and refusal of beast blood; oath-bound to support purity path

notes: Circle member. Vilkas is the intellectual conscience of the Companions — disciplined, sharp, and deeply aligned with Kodlak's desire for a cure. He resents the beast blood philosophically but struggles to contain the wolf's rage that makes him short-tempered. On the cure question he is firmly pro-cure.
combat_tactics: Vilkas fights with controlled aggression — he reads openings and waits for the perfect moment. His intelligence makes him unpredictable; enemies expecting a berserk Nord get a calculated swordsman.
